REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C G f1350 reute b f BC-SRI-LANKA-POSTPONES-E 10-20 0038

TEXT.TITLE: SRI LANKA POSTPONES EEP WHEAT TENDER - TRADE
TEXT.BODY: Sri Lanka has postponed until November its tender for 75,000 tonnes of wheat under the export bonus program, originally scheduled for today, U.S. exporters said. Reuter
